Package geometries

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.Polygon
geometries.Triangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
public class Triangle
extends Polygon
Triangle class represents a triangle in 3D Cartesian coordinate system by three vertexes
